page.title: 06THE SCHOOL IN GLENPROSEN
page.content: The present school at Glenprosen was built in 1875. During the last century there have been 443 pupils at the school.In 1984 a room from the ajoining schoolhouse was incorperated into the school.The origonal room has the pupils desks and all our daily work books, art materials plus our project work. The other room has the games, musical instruments, television and computer in it. It is where we can work undisturbed. Chart Of Pupils In Glenprosen School. -------------------------------------- P1 P2 P3 P4 P5 P6 P7 T Boys 1 0 2 O 2 2 0 7 Girls 2 1 0 1 1 0 3 8 We have only 1 full time teacher but we have a part time teacher 1 morning per week and visting specialists of art, music and gym occassionally.
